projects.name: zed-industries/zed contributions

- PR #26211: Implemented Extended Terminal Option in Zed (Rust + GPUI), including option wiring and validation.

projects.name: Appleosophy
projects.description: The official iOS app for Appleosophy. I built and shipped it as the sole iOS developer in 6 months, integrated the existing WordPress REST API backend, and delivered the full App Store release workflow.

projects.description: An interactive binary inspection playground for exploring executable internals directly in the browser.
